message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe is worth a lot. I'm open to offers, but I'm starting at $15000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $8000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to be flexible.  I'm prepared to come down to $12000.  This gives you a good deal, and still allows me to get closer to my desired price. Let's see if we can reach a deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9500. Can we consider that?
